text: KID Museum (Kids’ Innovation & Discovery) is a children's museum and child- oriented maker space in the Washington, D.C. suburb of Bethesda, Maryland. As of 2018, the small, not-for-profit museum operates on the lower floor of Bethesda's Davis Library, and hopes to expand to a larger site. The Washington Post describes KID as "The museum’s hands-on programs teach skills such as collaboration, creativity and critical thinking, as well as such technical skills as designing and building and even using power tools." ==References== Category:Children's museums in Maryland Category:Tourist attractions in Montgomery County, Maryland Category:Museums in Montgomery County, Maryland
title: KID Museum
